sections.heading: Requirement to remove encumbranceIf, at the termination of the usufruct, the thing subject to the usufruct is burdened by an encumbrance established by the usufructuary to secure an obligation, the usufructuary is bound to remove the encumbrance
sections.text: Acts 2010, No. 881, ยง1, eff. July 2, 2010.
